text: "Bless you! I hope Luke is suitably grateful, darling." "Oh, well," he shrugged diffidently, "I like the work. One gets plenty of variety and it's a change." Nigel was the hospital's Junior Medical Officer. "You won't be free about nine, I suppose, to meet me for supper somewhere?" she had asked hopefully.
